data.name: DzombZ
data.detailed_description:
Survive or die ! Experience survival horror full of mystery while escaping between the streets of Algeria after zombies invasion .
Suffer to protect your life in situations never attempt them before with first person perspective and powerful actions that make it more realistic then ever

Synopsis

The story is about the accident that turn the scales and throw amine from going to home and having a good sleep into a hell full of struggles that need to survive from , after waking up in a strange forest unable to geuss his position. he start walking into the unknown discovering and solving the mysteries he will find on his path . Can he survive ?

Features:

• Hide and Sneak

• Puzzles and investigations are integrated into the game for variety of gameplay.

• Unpredictable Enemies

• Deadly combat and stealth

• Challenging Gameplay

data.short_description: Survive or die ! Experience survival horror full of puzzles while escaping between the streets of Algeria after zombies invasion . Suffer to protect your life in situations never attempt them before with first person perspective and powerful actions that make it more realistic then ever

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3xxx series
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850 or better
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
